mapper.select: select id AS postId, title, content, user_name AS userName, user_id AS userId, module_id AS moduleId, type, `status`, create_time AS createTime from post where id = #{postId}

SELECT post.id AS postId, post.title, post.content AS postContent, post.`status` AS postStatus, module_id AS moduleId, module.`name` AS moduleName, module.`status` AS moduleStatus FROM post INNER JOIN module ON post.module_id = module.id WHERE post.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.id AS postId, TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, create_time, NOW( ) ) AS hours, f.follow AS follow FROM post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id AS postId, COUNT( 1 ) AS follow FROM user_attention WHERE `status` = '0' GROUP BY post_id ) f ON p.id = f.postId WHERE `status` = '0' AND f.follow > 0
